section.title: Compute (Nova)
section.p: Nova issue affecting instances with swap volumes being deleted, outlined in https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1457527 has been resolved in this release.

section.title: Monitoring (Monasca)
section.p: Resolved issue with the notification_environment key missing from the Monasca configuration files. The documentation on managing your notification methods for alarms has been updated to reflect this fix. See for more details.
